table.style: width: 100% ; height: 100% ; border-collapse: collapse ; background-color: rgb(255 , 255 , 255)

tr.td: Authenticate calling DFSPs; handle ILP calls; handle position calls

Calls internal services to handle fulfillment
and settlement
Handles validating ILP crypto conditions for transfers
Called by API; called by Settlement Service

Called by API; called by Settlement
Execution Service

Called by API; called by Fulfillment Service and
Settlement Service
Execute settlement process to net cash positions
Called by API or internally based on scheme
